intro: Donnellsmithia juncea, commonly known as the slender Donnellsmithia, is a rare and delicate flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its low-growing habit, with slender stems and small, clustered leaves. The plant produces tiny, white to pale yellow flowers that bloom in late summer. It thrives in cool, moist environments and is often found in shaded forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a species of conservation concern.
